Class Person

  • Object
    • Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Customer, Staff

    public class Person
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores the name and ID of objects of Staff and of Customer. Extended by Staff and Customer
    Author:
    YanHan
    See Also:
